articles.title: Eurozone inflation hits a new record high, says Eurostat - WION
articles.description: The European Central Bank has already warned last week that a recession is looming. It had announced a jumbo interest rate hike in order to attempt to curb inflation
articles.content: The European Union's statistics agency said on Monday (October 31) that inflation in Eurozone was at record 10.7 per cent in October. Just a month before, the same figure was at 9.9 per cent. A huge … [+1613 chars]

articles.title: In Africa's monkeypox outbreak, sickness and death go undetected - CTV News

articles.title: As a diesel crisis spreads in the West, could SA be next? | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: Diesel troubles have hit the US, with dears building in Europe, but South Africa is not as concerned about supply as it is about prices.
articles.content: As a diesel supply crisis hits the US and builds in Europe, fuel prices in South Africa will reach a record high this week, stoking inflationary pressures already weighing on critical industries and … [+460 chars]
